entry.title: Game: Contra: Hard Corps (GEN, 1994)
entry.content:
Game: Contra: Hard Corps (GEN, 1994)20130820
This was a very flashy game and clearly a lot better than
Contra 3. I found the two Shot system to be incredibly frustrating
and hard to deal with, so I put it down after rampaging through
the first level. I like that there a three bosses right away. It's
very "Treasure".

Total time: 0:09
  • Video Games
  • Contra: Hard Corps
  • GEN
  • 1994

entry.title: Game: Crusader of Centy (GEN, 1994) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Crusader of Centy (GEN, 1994) (3)20130820
I finished the game tonight in about an hour and a half. The end
was pretty fun. The revelations on the world and the progression
of the story was really wild and strangely deep. The idea that the
monsters are kind of the victims is really interesting.

I feel like this game was definitely good. There was enough polish
in all the right places and the game-play was solid. I still feel
that it lacks that transcendental quality that makes it worth
playing many times, but I will definitely recommend it.

Total time: 6:08
  • Video Games
  • Crusader of Centy
  • GEN
  • 1994

entry.title: Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (12)
entry.content:
Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (12)20130820
I did the Succubus boss fight tonight in just about fifteen
minutes. I'm finding it very hard to dodge and sustain enough
damage. The One-Hit Kill mode is going to be really tough.

Game 2:  3:05

entry.title: Game: Dynamite Headdy (GEN, 1994)
entry.content:
Game: Dynamite Headdy (GEN, 1994)20130820
I played the first two levels of this game. It is definitely
crazy, Japanese, and it feels like it could be deep. For my part,
in my time playing it, it just felt impenetrable. I was either
meandering around stampeding the obstacles or totally confused
about what I was supposed to be doing. It was very confusing and
hard to deal with.

The style of the world was very cool and unique. I liked the
Nutcracker Suite during the second boss fight especially!

Total time: 0:13
  • Video Games
  • Dynamite Headdy
  • GEN
  • 1994

entry.title: Game: Shadowrun (GEN, 1994)
entry.content:
Game: Shadowrun (GEN, 1994)20130820
I played this for just about five minutes and it was unbelievably
painful. I just hate Western RPGs and this was unbearable with its
lame Cyberpunk setting and the terrible font. I could just tell
that I'm going to hate it. Ugh.

Total time: 0:03

  • Shadowrun
  • GEN

entry.title: Game: Crusader of Centy (GEN, 1994) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Crusader of Centy (GEN, 1994) (2)20130819
I played for about two hours today and made significant
progress. I'm now time traveling and fixing all the
"misunderstandings" to help the world. I think the game play is
still very fun and polished. One annoyance I found is that it's
easy to accidentally grab things, like red switches, you were just
trying to approach. I like the game, but I don't think it will be
canonical for me. Just good.

Total time: 4:47
  • Video Games
  • Crusader of Centy
  • GEN
  • 1994

entry.title: Game: Crusader of Centy (GEN, 1994)
entry.content:
Game: Crusader of Centy (GEN, 1994)20130818
I was very impressed by this game. I played up to the Tower of
Babel. It is really fun and very similar to a Legend of Zelda
game, but it is much higher quality than any knock-off I've
played. I like the Animal-skill mechanic especially.

Total time: 2:24
  • Video Games
  • Crusader of Centy
  • GEN
  • 1994

entry.title: Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (10)
entry.content:
Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (10)20130818
I did another mission today in about thirty minutes. Something
strange was that I felt like things were different than before,
because I don't remember it being easy to get up to the second
camera was. There's very little to comment about on the game in
this run... the fights are hard and fun.

entry.title: Game: Mega Man V (GB, 1994) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Mega Man V (GB, 1994) (3)20130817
I finished the game today in about an hour. The shooter level was
really weird and different, but fun. I found the boss rush to be
much more grueling and boring than usual. Overall, the game was
very fun and had a very sincere effort at having a story. Kind of
odd actually.

Total time: 2:24
  • Video Games
  • Mega Man V
  • GB
  • 1994

entry.title: Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (8)
entry.content:
Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (8)20130816
I played today about 45 minutes and beat the second mission. I
didn't have to repeat many fights, so it felt like it was a lot
more of a smooth experience. The most memorable part was scouring
the level for unlockables that I couldn't get before, but I still
didn't get everything. :(

entry.title: Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (7)
entry.content:
Game: DmC: Devil May Cry (PS3, 2013) (7)20130815
I played the first mission on SoS mode. It was pretty fun. I found
the boss to be A LOT harder and the rest of the enemies to be on
par with near the end of the Nephilim mode game. I found even
doing one level was a little bit too much having just beat the
game, so I've decided to take it slow and do a mission or two
every day rather than huge play sessions like before.

Game 2:  0:44
Total time: 11:12

  • DmC: Devil May Cry
  • PS3
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong (GB, 1994)
entry.content:
Game: Donkey Kong (GB, 1994)20130815
This is an interesting game. The first bit of it seems like it
will just be like the arcade game, but then you quickly see that
it's really a puzzle platformer where you interact with these
little blocks throughout the level. It's pretty fun, but it has
the problem with lots of puzzles game sitting on your couch in
that it is a bit much to play for a long time.

Total time: 0:15
  • Video Games
  • Donkey Kong
  • GB
  • 1994

entry.title: Game: Mega Man V (GB, 1994)
entry.content:
Game: Mega Man V (GB, 1994)20130815
This was a fun Mega Man game. The small screen doesn't really hurt
anything and it works well. That said, it's just a normal Mega Man
game without much else to say for it.

entry.title: Game: Kirby's Dreamland 2 (GB, 1994)
entry.content:
Game: Kirby's Dreamland 2 (GB, 1994)20130814
I played the first four levels of this and wasn't very
interested. It fit in the same mental box as the other Kirby games
for me: very easy and very little challenge, but smooth controls
and cute graphics.

Total time: 0:08
